mapper.insert: INSERT INTO operation_log (operate_emp_id, operate_emp_name, operate_time, java_class_name, java_method_name, java_method_params, java_method_return, cost_time, is_success) VALUES (#{operateEmpId}, #{operateEmpName}, #{operateTime}, #{javaClassName}, #{javaMethodName}, #{javaMethodParams}, #{javaMethodReturn}, #{costTime}, #{isSuccess})
